舍.definition: (bound form) residence; house; (bound form) my (in speaking of relatives younger than oneself); (archaic) unit of distance equal to 30 li 里[li3]

舍人.definition: ancient office title; rich and important person

舍利.definition: ashes after cremation; Buddhist relics (Sanskirt: sarira)

舍利塔.definition: stupa; tower venerating the ashes of the Buddha

舍利子.definition: ashes after cremation; Buddhist relics (Sanskirt: sarira)
